data.comment: In the minute -5, Rossi (Bahia) is shown a red card without being on the pitch!
Rafael Moura (Goias) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
The first-half is now underway.
Goias to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
In the minute 3, Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda awards Bahia a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Goias.
In the minute 5, Daniel Villalva for Goias drives towards goal at Serra Dourada. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in Bahia.
Bahia are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 8, Bahia's Juninho Capixaba breaks free at Serra Dourada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda blows against Goias's Rafael Moura for offside.
In the minute 12, Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
Bahia drive forward but Clayson is judged offside.
In the minute 13, Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a Goias throw-in in Bahia's half.
Goias's Shaylon gets in a shot on goal at Serra Dourada. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 15, Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal kick for Goias at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 18, Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a throw-in for Bahia, close to Goias's area.
Throw-in high up the field for Bahia in Goiania.
Goias have a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to Bahia.
Goias's Vinicius Lopes gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bahia defender.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
In the minute 21, It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Goias.
In the minute 23, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Rossi.
Rossi for Bahia is back on the field again.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 26, Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 28, Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a Bahia throw-in in Goias's half.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 30, Goias have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda.
Goias have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda.
Can Goias capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bahia's half?
In the minute 31, Corner awarded to Goias.
Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Daniel Villalva of Goias gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 33, Bahia have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Bahia at Serra Dourada.
Free kick for Goias in the half of Bahia.
In the minute 36, Throw-in Goias.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a free kick to Goias.
Goias attack but David Duarte's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 37, Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda awards Bahia a goal kick.
Free kick Bahia.
Free kick for Bahia in the half of Goias.
In the minute 38, Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a free kick to Goias.
In the minute 39, Lucas Fonseca (Bahia) has received a yellow card from Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
Goias to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
Goias are coming forward and Caju gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
In the minute 44, Nino Paraiba for Bahia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Rossi for Bahia who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Bahiaâ€™s Rossi is on his feet again at Serra Dourada.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Ratinho has recovered and rejoins the match in Goiania.
In the minute 45, David Duarte returns to the field for Goias after picking up a slight injury.
Bahia's Rossi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
In the minute 45, Bahia make their fourth substitution with Marco Antonio replacing Daniel.
In the minute 45, Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda waits before resuming play because David Duarte for Goias is still down.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Goiania to check on Ratinho, who is grimacing with pain.
The second-half has started.
Important block from the Bahia defence as Shaylon fires in a strike for Goias.
In the minute 49, Vinicius Lopes (Goias) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda awards Bahia a goal kick.
Goal! Goias have got their heads in front thanks to a Vinicius Lopes strike.
In the minute 49, That's a fine assist from Shaylon.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Bahia have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 53, Gilberto of Bahia is pulled up for offside.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda.
Bahia have a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Goias needs to be cautious. Bahia have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Goias.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
In the minute 58, In Goiania Bahia attack through Elias. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
Claudio Prates (Bahia) is making a first substitution, with Elber replacing Clayson.
In the minute 59, Claudio Prates is making the team's second substitution at Serra Dourada with Saldanha replacing Gilberto.
Attention is being given to Goiasâ€™s Rafael Moura and play has been suspended briefly.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Goias close to the penalty box.
Rafael Moura is back on his feet again.
At Serra Dourada, David Duarte has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 62, In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Bahia at Serra Dourada.
Elias for Bahia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 63, Goal kick for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a Bahia throw-in in Goias's half.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Throw-in Bahia.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 68, In Goiania, Elias (Bahia) misses the target with a header.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda awards Goias a goal kick.
The home team have replaced Ratinho with Sebastian Salazar. This is the first substitution made today by Thiago Larghi.
In the minute 70, Douglas Baggio is replacing Shaylon for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda awards the home team a throw-in.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a free kick to Bahia just outside Goias's area.
In the minute 73, Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
Goias to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
In the minute 74, Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 74, Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Rossi for Bahia has been booked by Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda and receives a first yellow card.
Bahia's Rossi is whistled for offside at Serra Dourada.
Claudio Prates (Bahia) is making a third substitution, with Fessin replacing Rossi.
In the minute 76, Throw-in high up the field for Goias in Goiania.
Corner awarded to Goias.
Goias's Caju has been booked in Goiania.
Corner awarded to Goias.
In the minute 79, Elber (Bahia) sees red and is sent off in Goiania!
In Goiania Bahia attack through Fessin. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 84, Goias have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Goias at Serra Dourada.
The home team replace Ariel Cabral with Miguel Figueira.
In the minute 85, Fernandao is replacing Rafael Moura for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
Douglas Baggio is booked for the home team.
Goias will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Bahia.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a free kick to Bahia.
Juninho gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bahia.
10 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Free kick for Goias in the half of Bahia.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
Juan Pintado is replacing Daniel Villalva for the home team.
At Serra Dourada, Fernandao has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Fessin gets an equalizer for Bahia. The score is now 1-1.
Juninho (Bahia) gets a yellow card.
